abstract: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau on Wednesday delivered its first enforcement action against the financial industry, fining Capital One for pressuring and misleading more than two million credit card customers.
snippet: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau on Wednesday delivered its first enforcement action against the financial industry, fining Capital One for pressuring and misleading more than two million credit card customers.

headline.main: In Its First Action, Consumer Bureau Takes Aim at Capital One

byline.original: By Ben Protess and Jessica Silver-Greenberg
